page.title: 04CUSTOMS
page.content: These are some of the games we played: PEG LEG - one person at the top and the rest of the people down the bottom. The one on his own calls a person and they go up and hop on one leg and the first person tries to push them over and while they are doing it they say "Peg Leg". SKIPPING - "I like coffee, I like tea, I like Becca in with me. I don't like coffee, I don't like tea, I don't like Becca in with me". NINE NINE IN - one's IT and the others hide. When counter is out looking for them somebody can run to the post and say "nine nine out myself". FRENCH SKIPPING - just the same as ELASTICS. DALLAS - is a programme on TV. We just pretend to play it and be the actors. We also play POLO, BLACK MAGIC, HIDE AND SEEK, LONDON and WHITE HORSES.
